name: Untitled Goose Game - Demastered
description:
You have heard of a game getting a remastered version, now get ready for the world's first demastered game! Please enjoy this parody of the popular switch and PC game "Untitled Goose Game" by House House.

Controls:

Movement - W / A / S / D    OR      ARROW KEYS

Select - Z (Imagine that is the A button on a GameBoy)

Save - X (This time imagine that this is the B button on a GameBoy)
